name: Calm Wellness – Osobni planovi
short_description: Dva moda: Direktan unos ili upitnik od 140 pitanja. Edukativni wellness planovi. Nije medicinski savjet.
full_description:
Describe your condition or complete a guided questionnaire. Get a structured 5-day nutrition plan, lifestyle, mindfulness and psychoeducation.
• File uploads (labs, notes)
• History & offline cache
• PDF export
• Reminders
• Biometric lock & PIN
• Multi-language (HR/EN)

Disclaimer: Educational wellness content, not medical advice.
